entry.text:
Welcome to the showcase, the theme is randomized, refreshing the page will change the theme.

P.S. You can also use your keyboard by pressing (1-9)
e.g. Press 1 to select the first option.

stories.text: Choose one of the stories below.

yap.text: TempleOS is a 64-bit, non-preemptive multi-tasking,[8] multi-cored, public domain, open source, ring-0-only, single address space, non-networked, PC operating system for recreational programming.[9] The OS runs 8-bit ASCII with graphics in source code and has a 2D and 3D graphics library, which run at 640x480 VGA with 16 colors.[5] Like most modern operating systems, it has keyboard and mouse support.
